backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a complaint management system with user profiles, complaint CRUD operations, solution updates, banned word filtering, role-based access control (admin/user), and blob storage for proof attachments.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining all core types (Complaint, SolutionUpdate, UserProfile, ComplaintStatus, ComplaintCategory, Actor) and a no-op migration function that preserves existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks describing routing, admin guards, complaint/solution management, authentication, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, charts, sidebar).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon, viewport meta, title 'FLAME Issue Tracker', and script tag loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for complaint board, submit, detail, solutions, admin pages, and /api/whoami; wraps app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied page component displaying role-specific messages for guests (not logged in) and authenticated non-admins, with instructions to request admin access via Principal ID.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard component that checks user role and displays access denied screen for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header (logo, navigation, PrincipalIndicator, login/logout button), mobile menu, and footer; conditionally shows admin links based on user role.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Horizontal tabs component for filtering complaints by category (All, Food Services, Professors & Academics, etc.) with responsive wrapping layout.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintListIte: Renders a clickable card displaying a complaint's category, status, description, urgency level, and timestamp with relative time formatting.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintSearchA: Provides search input and filter dropdowns (category, status, urgency) for complaints with a clear filters button.
frontend/src/components/PrincipalIndicat: Displays the authenticated user's principal ID in a dialog with copy-to-clipboard functionality, hidden for anonymous users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and optional email.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadField: File upload input for complaint proof (images/PDFs up to 5MB) with validation, progress tracking, and removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Relate: Displays related categories as badges and related complaint IDs as clickable links for solution updates.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Soluti: Card component displaying a solution update with title, description, timestamp, and related links.
frontend/src/components/StatusTag.tsx: Renders a colored badge displaying complaint status (submitted, under review, in progress, resolved).
frontend/src/components/SubmitResultBann: Alert component displaying success or error messages with appropriate icons and styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Provides hooks to query the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerInfo.ts: Fetches and caches the current user's principal and role information, returning guest info when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, complaints (CRUD), solutions, and voting, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a professional university-themed color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/complaintTaxonomy.ts: Defines complaint categories (food services, academics, safety, etc.) with type-safe mappings and helper functions to convert category enums to display labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminComplaints: Admin page component for managing all complaints with functionality to update status, toggle visibility, and delete complaints. Includes confirmation dialogs and uses AdminRouteGuard for access control.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard landing page with navigation cards linking to complaint management and solution management sections, protected by AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSolutionsP: Admin page component for creating and publishing solutions/updates with title, description, related categories, and linked complaints. Protected by AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintBoardPage.ts: Displays public complaints with category tabs, search/filter controls, and separates active from resolved complaints in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintDetailPage.t: Shows detailed view of a single complaint including description, metadata, status, urgency level, and supporting proof with navigation back to the board.
Displays official solutions and updates published by administrators in response to common or resolved complaints.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitComplaintPage.t: React page component for submitting complaints with form validation, category selection, urgency level, proof upload, and authentication checks. Handles moderation errors and navigates to the complaint detail page after successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/WhoAmIPage.tsx: React page component that displays the current user's Internet Computer Principal ID and role (admin/user/guest) with copy-to-clipboard functionality and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, typography, animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a complaint tracking system for FLAME University students with known issues including /admin and /api/whoami returning 404 in production, and admin access denial problems.
